Title: Principal Insights Analyst - Unpublished R&D Product
RoleDescription:
Riots mission is to put players at the center of everything we do.  We do this by continuing to evolve and deliver new experiences to players with games like Teamfight Tactics, Legends of Runeterra, VALORANT, and League of Legends: Wild Rift. Riot is also expanding into the world of music/multimedia with the release of our animated series Arcane and music from KDA and True Damage.  In short - its an exciting time to be a Rioter.
As Principal Insights Analyst, you lead Insights efforts on an exciting new game at Riot. As a thought leader, you help the team deeply understand our audience and opportunities, and ensure we have the insights necessary to exceed our players needs across both game & marketing. You help shape strategy, and collaborate with the leadership and development teams to ensure the insights work supports refining that strategy and improving decision making . Help to connect product strategy with broader organizational and company strategy.
Help the team set targets for and monitor performance against development plans, goals, finances, & product KPIs.

Workforce planning, staffing, and hiring for Insights positions on the BU

Bachelor's degree in Business, Psychology, Economics, Mathematics or a related discipline plus 7 years of relevant experience (an advanced degree can account for up to 2 years of experience) 
Familiarity with both analytics and research and 6+ years experience in one or both of those crafts.
7+ years experience working directly in game development
Experience participating in strategy development for a product or business in a leadership capacity and helping to operationalize that strategy via ownership or advisory
Excellent teamwork, team leadership, communication, collaboration and stakeholder management
Experience building and leading cross-functional teams
Leading Insights (or related) teams for R&D game titles

Experience advising teams on product and game design problems by applying a combination of a broad & deep gaming background, game design craft, and product strategy thinking

Title: Senior 3D Character Artist - League of Legends, Summoners Rift

5+ years experience working as a 3D character artist in the video games industry

Experience working with modeling, sculpting, and texturing programs such as Maya/Max, Substance Painter, ZBrush, Photoshop, and 3DCoat
Knowledge of human anatomy, form, and color theory
Experience in creating high quality, stylized 3D character art
Demonstrated ability to create hand painted stylized characters through past professional or personal work samples
Experience working and communicating with multiple disciplines to find creative solutions and hit production goals
